backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user registration, chapter management (CRUD with revision tracking fields: theoryCompleted, pyqsCompleted, advancedPracticeCompleted), performance blocks, war mode stats, time slots, and consistency DNA tracking with Principal-based user data storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new data type schemas for ConsistencyDNA, Chapter, PerformanceBlock, TimeSlot, WarModeStats, and UserData, with a run function that currently performs no-op migration (returns old data unchanged).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of revision tracking toggles (Theory, PYQs, Advanced Practice) in MasterPCMChapterSystem with backend integration, real-time percentage calculation, and mobile-responsive layout across four high-confidence features (REQ-94 through REQ-97).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including App.tsx (main app with War Mode), useQueries.ts (React Query hooks with useUpdateChapterRevision), MasterPCMChapterSystem.tsx (chapter management with revision toggles), and other dashboard/tracking components with mobile-responsive design.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark theme OKLCH color tokens, custom CSS variables for light/dark modes, and base styles applying background/foreground colors to body element.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with inline loading spinner on dark background, viewport meta tags, and failsafe script that displays error message with reload button if React fails to mount within 10 seconds.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing authentication via Internet Identity, two-tab navigation (overview/chapters), War Mode state and lifecycle handlers, mobile swipe gestures, comprehensive error logging, and conditional rendering that hides all UI when War Mode is active.
frontend/src/components/ConsistencyDNATr: Displays a circular progress tracker showing user consistency percentage based on days consistent vs. days tracked, with buttons to mark daily consistency status and auto-registration for new users.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Real-time countdown timer to JEE Advanced 2026 (May 17, 2026) displaying days, hours, minutes, and seconds with critical styling when under 30 days remain.
frontend/src/components/DailyGoalTracker: Manages daily time slots with CRUD operations, allowing users to create, edit, delete, and toggle completion of scheduled activities with start/end times and activity types.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches rendering errors (especially BigInt serialization issues), logs detailed error information, and displays a user-friendly error UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/FocusStabilityIn: Calculates and displays a Focus Stability Index (FSI) score based on deep work hours, task switching, distraction levels, sleep quality, and war mode usage, with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/MasterPCMChapter: Main chapter management component with tabs for Physics/Chemistry/Math subjects, allowing users to add chapters, toggle completion status, and track revision progress (theory, PYQs, advanced practice) with difficulty and importance levels.
frontend/src/components/OverviewDashboar: Dashboard component displaying overall study metrics including chapter completion percentage, revision coverage by subject, critical incomplete chapters, War Mode statistics, and a button to launch War Mode with configurable focus/break durations.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceAnaly: Analytics component that tracks and visualizes study performance across five daily time blocks (7-10 AM through 7-11 PM) using bar charts, allowing users to record focus scores and productivity ratings for each session.
frontend/src/components/RevisionChecklis: Checklist component for tracking chapter revision status with filters by subject and completion status, displaying revision percentage badges (theory, PYQs, advanced practice) and allowing users to toggle chapter completion.
frontend/src/components/TopPYQsTracker.t: Component for tracking completion of Previous Year Questions (PYQs) by year, allowing users to toggle year completion status, add custom years (2000-2026), and view overall PYQ progress percentage.
frontend/src/components/WarMode.tsx: Implements a Pomodoro-style timer component with 50-minute work sessions and 10-minute breaks, tracking completed pomodoros and total study time with start/pause/skip controls.
frontend/src/components/WarModeConfigMod: Modal dialog for configuring War Mode session parameters including focus duration (preset or custom), optional break duration, and a confirmation step before starting.
frontend/src/components/WarModeScreen.ts: Full-screen War Mode timer implementation with configurable focus/break durations, pause/resume functionality, and session tracking that reports total focus minutes on completion or exit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login state, identity persistence, and authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user registration, consistency tracking, chapter management, performance blocks, time slots, and War Mode statistics with BigInt serialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for a dark theme color system using OKLCH values, and includes mobile-responsive utilities with touch-friendly sizing and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/utils/bigIntSerializer.ts: Utility functions to recursively convert BigInt values to strings or numbers in objects/arrays to prevent JSON serialization errors, plus a helper to detect BigInt presence.
frontend/src/utils/safeStringify.ts: Safe JSON.stringify wrapper that automatically converts BigInt values to strings during serialization, with a corresponding safeParse helper for consistency.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark theme with OKLCH color system, custom animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a JEE Advanced 2026 preparation app with features including countdown timer, Focus Stability Index, performance analytics, War Mode, PCM chapter system, and daily goal tracking with dark-themed mobile-optimized UI.
